metadata.title: CVE-2024-2756 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Due to an incomplete fix to CVE-2022-31629https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c43m-486j-j32p , network and same-siteattackers can set a standard insecure cookie in the victim's browser whichis treated as a __Host- or __Secure- cookie by PHP applications.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-2756` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.2 - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm3
